mapper.select: SELECT react_use.case_replies.CounterClaimContext, react_use.files.FileName, react_use.files.FileUrl FROM react_use.case_replies,react_use.cases,react_use.case_file_relations,react_use.files WHERE react_use.case_replies.CaseId = #{CaseId} and react_use.case_replies.PlatformId = #{PlatformId} and react_use.case_replies.Status = 2 and react_use.case_replies.DeleteFlag = 0 and react_use.cases.cid = #{PlatformId} and react_use.cases.PlatformId = 0 and react_use.cases.DeleteFlag = 0 and react_use.case_file_relations.CaseId = react_use.case_replies.CaseId and react_use.case_file_relations.RelationType = 1 and react_use.case_file_relations.PlatformId = #{PlatformId} and react_use.case_file_relations.RelatedId = react_use.case_replies.id and react_use.case_file_relations.DeleteFlag = 0 and react_use.files.id = react_use.case_file_relations.fileId and react_use.files.PlatformId = #{PlatformId} order by react_use.files.LastModifiedDate asc;
